text:
The method registerSamplerForEndNotification(HTTPSamplerBase) from the type HTTPSamplerBase.CleanerThread is never used locally.

There does not seem to be any code that adds items to the List samplersToNotify so AFAICT the CleanerThread class does not actually do anything.

This suggests there may be a bug - surely the code should add some entries to the list?
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
I think it's just a removal forgotten when fixing Bug 59034.
The call to it was removed within that bug.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
I see.

In which case there's some more work to do on that bug.
creator: sebb@apache.org
benoit.wiart@gmail.com
text: Should be closed the cleaner thread was removed.
